item.description:
Hi folks...

There are few chances in life to meet and pick the brain of a million dollar earner. This Saturday, we will me featuring Dr. Monique Vaughn and Vice Chairman, Andre Vaughn. Come to learn how they use our simple 3 step system to make millions.

http://www.youtube.co...

9am - Registration/Networking
10am - Business Overview/Million Dollar Training
Includes Potluck Lunch - Pulled Pork, Chicken wings, Sudaco Dana's Famous Chicken, Clam Chowder, 2 Alarm Chili, White Bean Chili, Vegetarian Casserole, Tossed Salad, Fruit Salad, Hot Pepper jam w/cream cheese and crackers, Chips, Assorted Home-baked goods, Assorted coffees and teas, Assorted sodas and more is being added daily!


Where: 1 Industrial Dr, Windham, NH

RSVP: Call Bernadette at 603-505-8683 or email at Bernadette@BostonAREIA.com
for Free entrance to this event - I only have 3 seats left!
If you can't make the meeting, however you are interested in learning more call Bernadette at 603-505-8683

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Meet Million Dollar Top Money Earners Dr. Monique and Mr. Andre Vaughn
